sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import HeroVideo from './../projectPage/HeroVideo.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import VideoSection from './../projectPage/VideoSection.js' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':'videos/beatbox/hero.mp4', } const a = { 'title':'Containing the Heart', 'text':'We put the heart into a box that was painted black and the interior was lined with black felt. A wooden frame was made and glued into the interior of the box. A black felt screen hides the mechanism.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/beatbox/1.jpg'), } const b = { 'title':'Matching Heart Rate', 'text':'An Arduino Uno takes an input from the heart rate sensor and uses that to determine the PWM duty cycle of the motor: the faster the heartbeat, the faster the motor. The heart rate sensor output also controls the brightness of the LED strip.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/beatbox/2.jpg'), } const c = { 'title':'Pumping the Heart', 'text':'The "heart plates" were hand moulded. Foil was then spray painted and glued to the plates. A motor is connected to a gear which drives a larger gear connected to a shaft. A snail cam on the shaft drives the heart plates and springs moves them back. ', 'video':'videos/beatbox/1.mp4', } function Beatbox(props) { return(
) } export default Beatbox;
